title: Japanese Anime, Made In China
description: Anime is a twenty-billion-dollar industry and it is growing fast. But traditionally, anime is produced in Japan.  What happens when other countries try producing Japanese-style animation?
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
